alert.note: Alert for Colbert (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 8:37PM CST until February 01 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations around 0.10 inches expected. * WHERE...Colbert county. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Given the recent stretch of warm weather and subsequently warm ground temperatures, bridges and other elevated and exposed surfaces will be most susceptible to glaze accumulations due to freezing rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
